sen.j: 北大路通（きたおおじどおり）は京都市の主要な東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: The Kitaoji-dori Street is one of the east-west running streets of Kyoto City.
The Kitaoji-dori Street is a street running east-west in Kyoto City.
The Kitaoji-dori Street is a street running east-west in Kyoto City.

sen.j: 戦前の都市計画により完成した。
sen.e: It was developed under a city plan before war.
It was developed as part of a city plan that was conceived before the war.
It was developed as part of a city plan that was conceived before the war.

sen.j: 東は白川通から西は西大路通まで。
sen.e: It runs from the Shirakawa-dori Street in the east and to the Nishioji-dori Street in the west.
It runs from Shirakawa-dori Street in the east and to Nishioji-dori Street in the west.
It runs from Shirakawa-dori Street in the east and to Nishioji-dori Street in the west.

sen.j: 京都市地域名をつらぬく全線4車線の幹線道路で、川端通と烏丸通の間の区間は国道367号になっている。
sen.e: It is a 4-lane arterial highway that runs through Kyoto City, with the section between the Kawabata-dori Street and the Karasuma-dori Street belonging to National Highway Route No. 367.
sen.cmt: 「京都市地域名をつらぬく」は「京都市をつらぬく」と訳しました。
sen.e: It is a 4-lane arterial highway that runs through Kyoto City, with the section between Kawabata-dori Street and Karasuma-dori Street belonging to National Highway Route No. 367.
It is a 4-lane arterial highway that runs through Kyoto City, with the section between Kawabata-dori Street and Karasuma-dori Street belonging to National Highway Route No. 367.

sen.j: 沿道は市街地化した郊外になっており、商業施設が目立つ。
sen.e: The area along the street is urbanized outskirts and commercial facilities are most common along the street..
The area along the street consist of urbanized suburbs and commercial facilities are most common along the street..
The area along the street consist of urbanized suburbs and commercial facilities are most common along the street.

sen.j: 特に烏丸北大路交差点付近は京都市北部の交通の拠点であり、北大路バスターミナルや京都市営地下鉄北大路駅などの施設があり多くの人でにぎわう。
sen.e: In particular, the transportation hub of northern Kyoto City is around Karasuma-Kitaoji crossing, where Kitaoji Bus Terminal and Kitaoji Station of Kyoto Municipal Subway/Kyoto City Subway is located and crowded with many people.

In particular, the transportation hub of northern Kyoto City is around Karasuma-Kitaoji crossing, where Kitaoji Bus Terminal and Kitaoji Station of Kyoto Municipal Subway/Kyoto City Subway is located, the area is crowded with many people.

In particular, the transportation hub of northern Kyoto City is around Karasuma-Kitaoji crossing, where Kitaoji Bus Terminal and Kitaoji Station of Kyoto Municipal Subway/Kyoto City Subway is located, the area is crowded with many people.

sen.j: かつては東大路通から西大路通までを京都市電が走っており、現在の北大路バスターミナルには烏丸車庫があった。
sen.e: Once Kyoto Municipal Streetcar ran between the Higashioji-dori Street and the Nishioji-dori Street and today's Kitaoji Bus Terminal used to be Karasuma shako (Karasuma carbarn).
The Kyoto Municipal Streetcar once ran between Higashioji-dori Street and Nishioji-dori Street and today's Kitaoji Bus Terminal used to be Karasuma shako (Karasuma carbarn).
The Kyoto Municipal Streetcar once ran between Higashioji-dori Street and Nishioji-dori Street and today's Kitaoji Bus Terminal used to be Karasuma shako (Karasuma carbarn).

tit.cmt: 文頭のみ大文字全角→半角

sen.j: 上側が東側、下側が西側。
sen.e: East is upper and west is lower.
The upper side is considered the eastern portion, while the lower side is considered the western portion.
The upper side is considered the eastern portion, while the lower side is considered the western portion.

sen.j: 左側が北側、右側が南側。
sen.e: North is on the left and south is on the right.
The left side is considered the northern portion, while the right side is considered the southern portion.
The left side is considered the northern portion, while the right side is considered the southern portion.

sen.j: 交差する道路の特記がないものは市町村道。
sen.e: Roads unless specified are operated by local municipalities.
Roads unless specified are operated by local municipalities.
